name: #StandwithUkrain Backgrounds
description:
https://vsdsnr.gumroad.com/l/ukraine

This beautiful designer background pack was created for your desktop and iphone. The hard situation stands for all Ukrainian folks, so let's share our support. All revenue will go to support Ukraine's Humanitarian aid.

https://war.ukraine.ua/support-ukraine/


The pack cosists of:

  • 12 Desktop Backgrounds for 2880px width (1440px) with and without text
  • 10 iPhone X / Pro backgrounds with and without text
  • 10 iPhone Pro Max backgrounds with and without text
  • 2 Language options: English and Ukranian
